name: Xóchitl and Draven's great cooking Adventure
name_original: Xóchitl and Draven's great cooking Adventure
description:
Just a small game I did to pass the time and get familiar with Renpy~!

This contains Oc stuff (yes, even OCXCanon) from South Park...If you think it's cringe...well, I'm sorry to disappoint! (I like being cringe anyway lol) 
It's not meant to be taken seriously. BUT if you don't like this content, this game isn't for you!

It's just something simple, to just kill some time and you're free to try it as long as you're respectful about it and don't use any of the pictures without my permission!

If there's any bug, please tell me about it!

If you're interested about the characters, you can see more of them on my instagram @xxdreamcherryxx !

Xóchitl, Draven, Itzia, Stella and Natt, All Art was made by me (@xxxdream-sodaxxx)

South Park belong to Trey Parker and Matt Stone

Rita belongs to @Cusackanne on DeviantArt!

Travis belongs to @TylaDoesThings on Twitter!

Alexia belongs to @Kitshime on Twitter!

The music were taken from three different providers!

https://audionautix.com/

https://wingless-seraph.net/en/index.html

https://tim-reichert.com/
